channel.title: Slower Than A Turtle
channel.description:
Waffle here.Again. Texts be strange to protec anons anonimouse moose.
What gives? Fresh Whonix 14 Virtualbox goodness, full up to date. But still,, it is slower than a turtle?
*grandma said that back in the day wonix 13 was speedy with the same mainframe i use today*
Anyone have suggestion for speed? Default settings apart from RAM which my mom increased to over 7gb for me.
Mom said it should work faster now because rams were the neck of the bottle not the central protractor unit.
Plz help meh.
